Name: Jesus Antonio
description:
Jesús has a fifth grade education, is single and lives with mother and sister.

For 10 years Jesús has been working in agriculture which he learned about from his father. He walks 800 meters from his home to his workplace and has a work schedule of Monday through Friday from 6:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. He also works as a bricklayer and used to be a moto-taxi driver.

Jesús is in need of a loan to buy farm supplies such as fertilizers, herbicides and manure for his crops.

He dreams of achieving a good harvest and of giving his family the best he can.
